Room.Name: Second Floor Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the second floor of the Towers. There is a plush carpet along the center of the hallway which runs west from here.
Room.LongDescription: The hallway is fantastically designed with many gold ornaments and arches throughout. The long red carpet on the floor spans the entire hallway. On the north side, you can see a railing which surrounds a large opening in in the floor. Apparently, you can watch the activities on the floor below. That must be the throne room down there.
